ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.icon

Class TreeIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.icon.SimpleIcon
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.icon.TreeIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OvalTreeIcon, RectangleTreeIcon, TriangleTreeIcon

    public abstract class TreeIcon
extends SimpleIcon
    This class is intended to be used as a label icon for a custom JTree renderer.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
